p: Naringenin possesses a wide spectrum of antimicrobial activities, including antifungal and antibacterial [ 169]. Naringenin is found to possess potent activity against Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus [ 170] and resistant strains of Helicobacter pylori [ 171]. Naringenin exhibits its antibacterial action by inhibiting the autoinducer-mediated cell signaling pathway [ 172].
